faq.question: What does Razorpay do?
faq.answer: Razorpay is a full-stack payments platform that helps businesses accept online payments, manage payouts, and access business banking services. We support 100+ payment modes including UPI, cards, netbanking, and wallets.

faq.question: Who is Razorpay for?
faq.answer: Razorpay is for any business that needs to accept payments - from startups and freelancers to large enterprises. We serve e-commerce, SaaS, education, healthcare, and many other industries.

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: Yes! There's no setup fee or annual fee. You only pay per transaction - 2% for domestic payments and 3% for international. Payment Links and basic Razorpay X are free to start.

faq.question: How long does integration take?
faq.answer: You can go live in as little as 10 minutes with Payment Links. For Payment Gateway integration, most developers complete it in 1-2 days using our APIs and SDKs.

faq.question: What payment methods do you support?
faq.answer: We support 100+ payment modes: all major credit/debit cards, UPI, Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, all major netbanking banks, EMI options, and international cards.

faq.question: Is Razorpay secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We're PCI DSS Level 1 compliant, the highest level of security certification. We also have 3D Secure, fraud detection, and are RBI regulated.

faq.question: How fast are settlements?
faq.answer: Standard settlement is T+2 days. With Razorpay X, you can get instant settlements for a small additional fee.

faq.question: Do you support subscriptions and recurring payments?
faq.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated Subscriptions product. You can set up recurring billing with automatic retries, proration, and invoice generation.

faq.question: Can I accept international payments?
faq.answer: Yes, we support international cards from 100+ countries. International transaction fee is 3% per transaction.

faq.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer 24/7 email and chat support for all customers. Phone support and dedicated account managers are available for Growth and Enterprise plans.

developer.pitch: Our APIs are developer-first with comprehensive documentation, SDKs for all major languages, and sandbox testing. Most integrations take just 1-2 days.

founder.pitch: Focus on growing your business while we handle payments. From Day 1 startup to Series D, Razorpay scales with you. No upfront costs, pay only when you earn.

product_manager.pitch: Improve checkout conversion with 100+ payment options and smart routing. Our dashboard gives you real-time analytics on payment success rates.

finance.pitch: Automated reconciliation, GST-compliant invoices, and instant settlements. Razorpay X gives you complete control over your business finances.
